T02D3742:76b-4: 'phags pa dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3742:76b-5: mi bskyod pa'am tha mal snying gar ni //
T02D3742:76b-6: aa las zla snying h'um nag gser 'od can //
T02D3742:76b-7: las byung rdo rje rtse dgu'i lte ba la //
T02D3742:76b-8: zla steng h'um gi 'od kyis lha spyan drangs //
T02D3742:76b-9: mchod pas mnyes te rang gi snying gar zhugs //
T02D3742:76b-10: tshad med bzhi dang byang chub sems bskyed la //
T02D3742:76b-11: rdo rje 'od kyis dngos kun lhar bsgyur thim //
T02D3742:76b-12: aom a'as spyan drang der bstim lhar gsal bya //
T02D3742:76b-13: padma nyi mar nor bdag rgya na spras ba //
T02D3742:76b-14: nor skyug mgo rkang gnon pa khro ba'i gzugs //
T02D3742:76b-15: mi bskyod dbu mdzes thod khrag ne'u le 'dzin //
T02D3742:76b-16: klus brgyan thugs kar zla ba sngar bzhin bsam //
T02D3742:77a-0: @77a * // dbu zhal dpung pa g-yas g-yon thugs ka dang //
T02D3742:77a-1: g-yas g-yon brla dang gsang gnas byin gnyis la //
T02D3742:77a-2: zla bar yi ge bcu ba gser 'od 'phro //
T02D3742:77a-3: 'od kyis mchod dang lhar bsgyur nor bsdus skyug /
T02D3742:77a-4: lag mthil bam las gser bum rin chen skyug /
T02D3742:77a-5: mdzub mo gung mo ming med mthe'u chung dang //
T02D3742:77a-6: mthe bong nor 'chang g-yas g-yon yi ge bcu //
T02D3742:77a-7: aom aindra ni mu kham bhra ma ri sv'a h'a /
T02D3742:77a-9: rim bzhin byin gyis brlab dang dbul sngags so //
T02D3742:77a-10: phyag dang zhal dang gsang gnas nang nas phyag /
T02D3742:77a-11: de nas zhal du dmar ser chu rgyun 'jug /
T02D3742:77a-12: na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
T02D3742:77a-13: na mo ma ni bha dr'a ya /
T02D3742:77a-14: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D3742:77a-15: aom dzambha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
T02D3742:77a-16: lo phyed thun drug chu phul 'byor chen 'grub //
T02D3742:77a-17: spogs na h'um mdzad khros pas dug khrag dang //
T02D3742:77a-18: tsha ba ske tshe mar khus byugs te bskam //
T02D3742:77a-19: ram las khong par gru gsum me bsams dbul //
T02D3742:77a-20: sa'am rdo las mkhyid gang sku gzugs bya //
T02D3742:77a-21: lha bstim thab khung gzhug ste mchod par bya //
T02D3742:77a-22: rtsibs brgyad 'khor lor sku 'am sngags bris te //
T02D3742:77a-23: lha bstims dril te rin chen 'bar gzugs 'chang //
T02D3742:77a-24: sna tshogs rgyun du zhabs nas chu 'dzag pa'i //
T02D3742:77a-25: 'og tu lha sku ye shes bstims pa gzhug /
T02D3742:77a-26: mal logs sngas sam sku bri ye shes gzhug / gzugs brnyan snod nang 'chang byas chud bul lo //
T02D3742:77a-27: au tsushma sgrub pa'i thabs thun mong ma yin pa
T02D3742:77a-28: slob dpon sgeg pa rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so
